sections.content:
Question:
What evaluation boards are available?
Answer:
We have a simple target board using RL78/F24 100pin LQFP package. This also covers the functionality of RL78/F23, so it can also be used for RL78/F23. We also have a Renesas Solution Starter Kit that allows you to experience control of BLDC, security, etc.
Suitable Products
RL78/F23, RL78/F24
